   20: -module(group_timetrap_3_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: 
   27: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %%% CONFIG FUNCS
   29: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   30: 
   31: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   32:     Info = case catch apply(?MODULE,TestCase,[]) of 
   33: 	       {'EXIT',_} -> [];
   34: 	       I -> I
   35: 	   end,
   36:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("init( ~w ): ~p", [TestCase, Info])),    
   37:     Config.
   38: 
   39: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   40:     ok.
   41: 
   42: %%%------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %%% TEST DECLARATIONS
   44: %%%------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: 
   46: groups() ->
   47:     [{g1,[],[t11]},
   48:      {g2,[],[t21]},
   49:      {g3,[],[{group,g4},t31,{group,g5}]},
   50: 
   51:        {g4,[],[t41]},
   52:        {g5,[],[t51]},
   53: 
   54:      {g6,[],[t61]},
   55:      {g7,[],[{group,g8},t71,{group,g9}]},
   56: 
   57:        {g8,[],[t81]},
   58:        {g9,[],[t91]},
   59: 
   60:      {g10,[],[t101]},
   61:      {g11,[],[t111]}
   62:     ].
   63:      
   64: 
   65: all() -> 
   66:     [t1,
   67:      {group,g1},
   68:      {group,g2},
   69:      t2,
   70:      {group,g3},
   71:      t3,
   72:      {group,g6},
   73:      {group,g7},
   74:      {group,g10},
   75:      {group,g11}
   76:     ].
   77: 
   78: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   79: %%% INFO FUNCS
   80: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   81: 
   82: suite() -> [{timetrap,1000}].
   83: 
   84: group(g1) -> [{timetrap,500}];
   85: 
   86: group(g2) -> [{timetrap,1500}];
   87: 
   88: group(g3) -> [{timetrap,500}];
   89: 
   90: group(g4) -> [{timetrap,250}];
   91: 
   92: group(g5) -> [{timetrap,1500}];
   93: 
   94: group(g6) -> [{timetrap,250}];
   95: 
   96: group(g7) -> [{timetrap,250}];
   97: 
   98: group(g8) -> [{timetrap,250}];
   99: 
  100: group(G) when G /= g11 -> [].
  101: 
  102: t3() -> [{timetrap,250}].
  103: 
  104: t61() -> [{timetrap,500}].
  105: 
  106: t71() -> [{timetrap,500}].
  107: 
  108: t81() -> [{timetrap,750}].
  109: 
  110: t91() -> [{timetrap,250}].
  111: 
  112: %%%------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: %%% TEST CASES
  114: %%%------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: 
  116: t1(_) ->
  117:     ct:sleep(3000),
  118:     exit(should_timeout).
  119: 
  120: t11(_) ->
  121:     ct:sleep(750),
  122:     exit(should_timeout).
  123: 
  124: t21(_) ->
  125:     ct:sleep(3000),
  126:     exit(should_timeout).
  127: 
  128: t2(_) ->
  129:     ct:sleep(1250),
  130:     exit(should_timeout).
  131: 
  132: t31(_) ->
  133:     ct:sleep(750),
  134:     exit(should_timeout).
  135: 
  136: t41(_) ->
  137:     ct:sleep(350),
  138:     exit(should_timeout).
  139: 
  140: t51(_) ->
  141:     ct:sleep(2000),
  142:     exit(should_timeout).
  143: 
  144: t3(_) ->
  145:     ct:sleep(500),
  146:     exit(should_timeout).
  147: 
  148: t61(_) ->
  149:     ct:sleep(750),
  150:     exit(should_timeout).
  151: 
  152: t71(_) ->
  153:     ct:sleep(750),
  154:     exit(should_timeout).
  155: 
  156: t81(_) ->
  157:     ct:sleep(1000),
  158:     exit(should_timeout).
  159: 
  160: t91(_) ->
  161:     ct:sleep(350),
  162:     exit(should_timeout).
  163: 
  164: t101(_) ->
  165:     ct:sleep(1500),
  166:     exit(should_timeout).
  167: 
  168: t111(_) ->
  169:     ct:sleep(1500),
  170:     exit(should_timeout).
  171: 
  172:
